product_name: Sanuk You Got My Back II Shoes - Men's
long_description: Can't get away with flip-flops at the office? Try the slip-on Sanuk You Got My Back II Shoes that sport canvas uppers on a sandal base. Billed as a sandal-shoe hybrid, You Got My Back II Shoes are cotton canvas uppers on sandal bottoms. Cotton canvas uppers look great no matter where you go; subtle stretch gores offer slip-on ease and comfort. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption and stability. EVA midsoles offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on. Sanuk You Got My Back II Shoes are vegan-friendly.
short_description: Can't get away with flip-flops at the office? Try the slip-on Sanuk You Got My Back II Shoes that sport canvas uppers on a sandal base.
